docs.lead_paragraph: A doctor and a lawyer offer suggestions to make them decipherable.

docs.lead_paragraph: Committee leaders in both parties were already calling for new negotiations on a more bipartisan approach.

headline.print_headline: Senate Passes Cost-Cutting Budget Plan, but Calls for a New Approach Soon Follow

docs.abstract: Senate approves first joint congressional budget plan in six years; broad aspirations of proposal, which includes spending cuts, overhaul of poverty programs and repeal of the health care reform act, make it likely to fail when deliberations begin over legislation to carry out the changes.
docs.snippet: Committee leaders in both parties were already calling for new negotiations on a more bipartisan approach.

docs.lead_paragraph: Squeezed by competition and insurance cuts, air ambulance companies are increasingly pressing patients to make up sometimes sizable shortfalls.

headline.main: Air Ambulances Offer a Lifeline, and Then a Sky-High Bill

docs.abstract: Air ambulance services have aggressively expanded their networks across United States while raising rates, saving large number of lives but leaving patients with enormous bills; problem has been made worse as private insurers reduce or eliminate coverage of service; as a result, companies like Air Methods have resorted to hard-edged legal tactics to force patients to pay.
docs.snippet: Squeezed by competition and insurance cuts, air ambulance companies are increasingly pressing patients to make up sometimes sizable shortfalls.

docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Senate on Tuesday narrowly passed a Republican budget plan that prescribes deep domestic spending cuts to eliminate deficits by 2024 and aids the party's goal of trying to dismantle President Barack Obama's signature healthcare law.

headline.main: Senate Republicans Pass Budget Plan, Eye Obamacare Repeal
headline.print_headline: Senate Republicans Pass Budget Plan, Eye Obamacare Repeal

docs.snippet: The U.S. Senate on Tuesday narrowly passed a Republican budget plan that prescribes deep domestic spending cuts to eliminate deficits by 2024 and aids the party's goal of trying to dismantle President Barack Obama's signature healthcare law.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Hawaii Legislature has passed a bill that could make it a lot easier for transgender people to change their gender on their birth certificates.

headline.main: Hawaii Bill for Birth Certificate Gender Change Passes
headline.print_headline: Hawaii Bill for Birth Certificate Gender Change Passes

docs.snippet: The Hawaii Legislature has passed a bill that could make it a lot easier for transgender people to change their gender on their birth certificates.

docs.lead_paragraph: Three years after a public school strike, Chicago teacher contract talks are off to a rocky start, with the debt-burdened district demanding a 7 percent pay cut, union officials said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Chicago Asks School Teachers to Take 7 Percent Pay Cut: Union
headline.print_headline: Chicago Asks School Teachers to Take 7 Percent Pay Cut: Union

docs.snippet: Three years after a public school strike, Chicago teacher contract talks are off to a rocky start, with the debt-burdened district demanding a 7 percent pay cut, union officials said on Tuesday.

docs.lead_paragraph: Health insurers would be prevented from covering the cost of abortions except in medical emergencies under a bill approved on Tuesday by the Republican-dominated Texas Senate.

headline.main: Texas Senate Passes Measure to Cut Insurance Payments for Abortions
headline.print_headline: Texas Senate Passes Measure to Cut Insurance Payments for Abortions

docs.snippet: Health insurers would be prevented from covering the cost of abortions except in medical emergencies under a bill approved on Tuesday by the Republican-dominated Texas Senate.

headline.main: Two Premises on Poverty and Culture

docs.abstract: The material impact of welfare spending is real. The social impact is highly debatable.
